TITLE: Episode 1 - Is Libertarianism LGBT Friendly?
DESCRIPTION: Welcome to the first episode of Lesbertarian. I know what you're wondering. "How could the political philosophy of greedy, old white men ever be friendly to the LGBT community?" This week, I'll be answering that question just for you.
